stanzas: <div>Unnodu Vazhatha Song Lyrics Amarkalam

Unnodu vazhaatha
vazhvenna vazhvu
en ul nenju solgirandhu

poovodu pesaadha kaatrenna
kaatru oru poonjolai
kaetkindradhu

mannil yaen yaen yaen
neeyum vandhaai
endhan penmai poo pookkave

naan pirakkum munne
ada nee pirandhathen
naan pirakkum podhu
nee undhan kaiyil
ennai yaendha thaano
Unnodu vazhaatha..

Melliya aanmaganai
pennukku pidikkaadhu
muradaa unai rasithaen

thottavum vilundhuvidum
aadavam pidikkaathu
garvam adhai madhithaen

mudi kuthum undhan maarbu
en panju meththaiyo
en uyir pirikkum muthan
adhu panju methaiyo

unnai pole aanillaye
neeyum ponaan naanillaye
neeradippaathe
meen azhuvathillaye
aanmaakkul oodal illai
Unnodu vazhaatha..

naan kulir kaaiven

unnai moththam nesikkiren
